casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Aiyana STANLEY-JONES, BY Charles JONES, Personal Representative, and Dominika Stanley, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Officer Joseph WEEKLEY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157287
COA: 334619 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 18, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
